item.title: Why JavaScript and PHP are Evergreen
item.description: There are only two kinds of languages: the ones people complain about and the ones nobody uses. Bjarne Stroustrup (Inventor of C++) Over the last fifteen years, I’ve used over a dozen languages, from Classic ASP to Python, from .Net to Ruby. Yet, I still keep coming back to PHP and Javascript. I’ve found over my career that PHP and Javascript are primarily used by people who get shit done.
